tool_description: Identifies and classifies specific products or product categories mentioned in customer feedback using keyword matching and contextual analysis.

feedback_texts.description: Array of feedback texts to analyze for product mentions

product_catalog.description: List of known products or product categories

include_synonyms.description: Whether to include product synonyms and variations in matching

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text to analyze.
Empty product catalog: Provide at least one product for identification.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Product identification failed: Unable to process feedback for product identification.
usage: Provide feedback_texts and product_catalog arrays. Set include_synonyms and confidence_threshold as needed. Returns identified products with confidence scores.

identified_products.description: Primary product identified in each feedback

product_confidence.description: Confidence score for each product identification

multiple_products.description: Whether multiple products were mentioned in each feedback

no_product_count.description: Number of feedback texts with no identifiable products
